heading.heading: Learning Center
heading.description: The Learning Center offers Supplemental Instruction (SI) Leaders and Tutors who facilitate learning of difficult topics within challenging courses, as well as one-on-one support from an Academic Success Coach who addresses unique student needs. The Learning Center aims to inspire a community of lifelong learners by integrating the culture and values of each student.

items.title: Tutoring
items.description: Studying made simple with students setting their own agenda and working at their own pace.

items.title: Supplemental Instruction
items.description: Peer led, weekly group study sessions offered to students enrolled in historically difficult courses.

items.title: Academic Success Coaching
items.description: Academic and personal coaching on time management, study skills, university resources and much more.
